"T:The Freezing Burn":
"We have discovered a space-time distortion
holding a pocket of alien space near the
ARKS Ship.
This space contains a tower-like structure,
inhabited by a powerful hostile entity with
power over fire and ice, known as Elzelion.
Deploy and subdue this entity.
――――――――――――――――――――
Maximum damage cap: 999999
Failure: Time limit, 3 total incapacitations"

"From here, mew can get to the
top of the tower where mew'll
meet the Burning Zero, Elzelion."

"Elzelion is an Elder Dragon
with power over s-claw-ching
flames and fur-eezing ice."

"It could go from hot to cold at
a meowment's notice, so keep
a cat's eye on what it's up to!"

"Quest Objective [Defeat Burning Zero: Elzelion!]

Quest fails if there are three incapacitations between the entire party"
